sense.def:
Kadar ptica ali letalo
swoops
, se med letom nenadoma v loku spusti navzdol.

seg.quote: We saw a distant eagle swoop down from the sky.
The swallow made a dazzling swoop through the air.

sense.def:
Kadar vojaki ali policisti
swoop on a place
, se nenadoma in hitro približajo nekemu kraju, da bi ga napadli in nekoga aretirali.

seg.quote: British troops swooped down twice in dawn raids.
The police made a swoop on the headquarters.
